Zephyr Break is a Spell in Baldur's Gate 3. Zephyr Break is an spell exclusive to the Nyrulna Legendary Trident and unlocked by having proficiency on it. Zephyr Break is a Lvl 2 Spell from the Evocation school. Spells can be used for dealing damage to Enemies, inflicting Status Ailments, buff Characters, or interacting with the environment.
